content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a man named Peter Schmidt. He is the potential landlord of the apartment I am considering renting in München.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment. We were negotiating the price and trying to reach a mutually agreeable amount.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [I don't have a rating to provide, but if I were to rate, it would be a 7. The negotiation was smooth and respectful, but it did involve bargaining, which is not necessarily indicative of likeability.]
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [I do not have any such feelings to report, as the conversation was conducted in a respectful and professional manner.]
name: Max Müller
